product.name: 2" X 20' PVC SCH 40 Pipe - Plain End
product.productOverview: Pipe; Nominal Pipe Size 2"; Schedule 40 S; Thickness 0.154"; Length 20'; End Connection Plain x Plain; Material PVC; Material Specification ASTM D1784/D1785/D2665; Finish White; Pressure Rating 280 PSI at 73 Deg F; Temperature Rating 140 Deg F; Application DWV, Sewer and Storm Drainage; Applicable Standard NSF 14/61, Federal Specification L-P-320A, FHA UM 79A; Warranty 5 Year Limited
product.featuresAndBenefits: PVC Schedule 40 is Highly Durable, With High Tensile and Impact Strength; It is Easy to Install and has Better Sound Deadening Qualities than PVC Schedule 40 DWV Foam Core; Installation Requires the Use of Primer and Solvent Cement; For Pressure Applications, Sharply Angeled Pressure Fittings Must be Used; 5 Year Limited Warranty
